languages.text: "Если в этом опять замешан проклятый Последний восход — я просто обязан{mf||а} тебе помочь. Этот культ должен быть выжжен огнем по всему Простору".
"If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Если в этом опять замешан проклятый Последний восход — я просто обязан{mf||а} тебе помочь. Этот культ должен быть выжжен огнем по всему Простору".

traits.locale_text: "If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."
"If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."

"If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: “如果这件事情真的和那该死的终末黎明教派有关，那我有责任帮助你。我必须让那个邪教在科罗努斯扩区彻底灰飞烟灭。”
languages.original_text: "If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “如果这件事情真的和那该死的终末黎明教派有关，那我有责任帮助你。我必须让那个邪教在科罗努斯星域彻底灰飞烟灭。”

languages.text: «Si el maldito Amanecer Final está involucrado, es mi deber ayudarla. Hay que reducir a su culto a cenizas en toda la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Si el maldito Amanecer Final está involucrado, es mi deber ayudarla. Hay que reducir a su culto a cenizas en toda la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: 「あの忌々しき最後の夜明けが再び関与しているのであれば、お前を助けるのが{mf|俺|私}の義務だ。あの教団はコロヌス・エクスパンス全域で灰燼に帰すべきだ」
languages.original_text: "If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「あの忌々しき最後の夜明けが再び関与しているのであれば、お前を助けるのが{mf|俺|私}の義務だ。あの教団はコロヌス・エクスパンス全域で灰燼に帰すべきだ」

languages.text: "Wenn wieder diese verfluchte letzte Dämmerung die Finger im Spiel hat, ist es meine Pflicht, Euch zu helfen. Dieser Kult muss in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung vernichtet werden."
languages.original_text: "If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn wieder diese verfluchte letzte Dämmerung die Finger im Spiel hat, ist es meine Pflicht, Euch zu helfen. Dieser Kult muss in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung vernichtet werden."

languages.text: « Si ces misérables de l'Aube finale sont impliqués dans cette histoire, il est de mon devoir de vous aider. Leur culte doit être exterminé dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Si ces misérables de l'Aube finale sont impliqués dans cette histoire, il est de mon devoir de vous aider. Leur culte doit être exterminé dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: "Kahrolası Nihai Şafak da bu işe müdahil olduysa yardım etmekten başka çarem yok. Tarikatın Koronus Enginliği'ndeki varlığı, ateşler içinde sonlanmalı. Geriye küllerinden başka bir şey kalmayana dek durmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "If the accursed Final Dawn is involved again, it is my duty to help you. That cult must be reduced to ashes throughout the entire Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Lanetli Nihai Şafak da bu işe müdahil olduysa yardım etmekten başka çarem yok. Tarikatın Koronus Enginliği'ndeki varlığı, ateşler içinde sonlanmalı. Geriye küllerinden başka bir şey kalmayana dek durmayacağım."
